name: Survive 32 - OneGameAWeek #1
description:
Survive 32 is the first game of a one-game-a-week state of mind. It's a bullet hell where you need to survive 32 seconds. It's short and it's tough - much like life itself. 

Engine: Unity

Art: 2D Platformer Tileset, Danil Chernyaev. (Modified) 
( https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-platformer-tileset-1731...)

Music: Caves of Dawn, Guilherme Bernardes (https://pixabay.com)
